input.sentences: a complex and healthy meal was prepared .
cooking skills | including how to properly open an avocado | were on display .
a fancy salad preceded the main meal .
the main meal was paired with rose and white wine .
the meal was finished off with a dessert topped with grapes .
output.sentences: I started my diet and prepared a healthy meal.
I added so many vegetables to the meal including avacado but I'm not sure I have the skills to cut it properly.
Not getting discouraged I proceded and had a salad before the main course.
I've heard white wine is good for you so I included that and put a rose on my table as a center piece.
After the meal I enjoyed a very unhealthly dessert but I topped it off with grapes so I wouldn't feel as guilty about it.
